talk.author: did:plc:jhn2nyy3ytqpsalsyvj52gnc
talk.utter: A lot of people that just buy houses just to live in them?

talk.author: did:plc:kpyxbg6gqj3dnwndu6ryefdo
talk.utter: They're also speculating that their land won't depreciate in value at the very least. And many of course end enriching themselves with their non- speculation.

talk.author: did:plc:b43r2ysiyablfjq6it36u6yx
talk.utter: You sound like my realtor mother-in-law - in other words, someone whose priorities horrify me. If you're choosing a home for money and not love, in my opinion, you deserve to lose your shirt.

talk.author: did:plc:kpyxbg6gqj3dnwndu6ryefdo
talk.utter: I think your mother in law understands what real estate is about. It doesn't matter if you have warm fuzzies about buying a home, you're going to get its full market value when you sell it regardless.
